chapters.title: Prologue: Snow
chapters.info: Lady Elenia Sarand, p. 31 (20)—Shrewish, honey-haired Andoran noble with an eye for Rand. Her husband Jarid opposed Morgase during the Succession. Dyelin exiled her from Caemlyn, as Morgase did long ago, for attempting to take the Lion Throne. She still plans to take it from Elayne. See also Sarand, Jarid.
